Interface Poisonable

public interface Poisonable

This defines the interface for poisoning channels and other sycnronisation objects.

Description

Poisonable defines the interface for ...

It is included for completeness. Usually, when needing a channel interface, we will know whether it's to be used for input or output and, therefore, should use the restricted interface rather than this one.

See Also:
jcsp.lang.ChannelInput, jcsp.lang.ChannelOutput
